data.text: @szilla11 That doesn’t concern you at all?

@szilla11 Dawg. I’m just giving you a hard time. I just find it that no one is talking about it anymore. News outlets have abandoned it. Politicians have focused their attention to other matters but a month ago you didn’t wear a mask you couldn’t walk into any store in socal.
@funkepopz Got asked a question. I answered based on what is happening. Covid didn’t completely disappear but it’s obvious people aren’t getting as sick because of immunity
@funkepopz They’ll probably be another spike in summer unless it doesn’t continue to mutate and just becomes less pervasive

@funkepopz Everyone got sick this winter. We’re in a stretch where not a lot of people are getting sick because there is no one left to get sick right now. I see it playing out at my school. So many kids were out from January to mid February. Everyone is back now and it’s been consistent
